title: Women's Intimate Health Treatments
description: Doctor-led intimate rejuvenation, pelvic floor therapy, and inflammatory care for every season of womanhood.
longDescription: Sensitive symptoms after childbirth, perimenopause, or chronic inflammation deserve the same level of clinical precision as any other healthcare concern. Our women's intimate health programme blends regenerative PRP, energy-based tightening, and pelvic neuromuscular therapies to restore lubrication, support bladder control, and reignite sensual confidence.\n\nEvery visit is led by Dr. Syed Nadeem Abbas or our senior female clinicians in discreet suites with optional chaperones, so you feel fully supported from consultation to aftercare.

seo.metaTitle: Women's Intimate Health Clinic London | O-Shot, Ultra Femme & EMSELLA | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Explore O-Shot PRP, Ultra Femme 360, EMSELLA pelvic floor therapy, and lichen sclerosus care at Dr. SNA Clinic London. Discreet regenerative treatments for women's sexual wellness.
seo.h1: Women's Intimate Health Treatments in London

hero.headline: Specialist Care for Women's Intimate Wellness
hero.subheadline: Regenerative PRP, radiofrequency, and pelvic therapies tailored to your life stage

introduction.title: The Comfort-First Clinic Women Recommend
introduction.content: We combine discreet scheduling, hormone-aware diagnostics, and evidence-based regenerative medicine to address the root cause of dryness, laxity, pain, or bladder leaks. Expect longer appointments, compassionate explanations, and personalised plans that honour both your biology and your boundaries.
highlights: Dual-spin PRP and FDA-listed energy devices
Blended treatment plans for complex cases
Digital check-ins to track progress between visits

treatmentCategories.title: Regenerative Rejuvenation
treatmentCategories.description: Reawaken arousal, sensitivity, and lubrication with advanced PRP and RF tightening.

treatmentCategories.title: Pelvic Floor Strength & Support
treatmentCategories.description: Neuromuscular stimulation that performs 11,000 Kegels in under 30 minutes.

treatmentCategories.title: Comfort & Dermatological Care
treatmentCategories.description: Soothe inflammatory skin conditions and rebuild healthy vulvar tissue.

prp-shot-women.title: O-Shot® PRP for Women
prp-shot-women.shortDescription: Clitoral and G-spot PRP injections that boost lubrication and orgasm quality.
prp-shot-women.description: Our O-Shot protocol concentrates platelet-rich plasma up to 6x baseline and strategically injects it along the clitoral complex, anterior vaginal wall, and labia to promote nerve regeneration, collagen production, and healthier blood flow.
prp-shot-women.downtime: Zero downtime – resume intimacy same day

ultra-femme-360.title: Ultra Femme 360™
ultra-femme-360.shortDescription: Radiofrequency tightening for labial contour and vaginal support without surgery.
ultra-femme-360.description: This 8-minute internal and external RF treatment heats tissue to 42–45°C, triggering collagen remodelling for tighter vaginal walls, improved moisture retention, and refined labial appearance.

btl-emsella-chair.title: BTL EMSELLA® Chair
btl-emsella-chair.shortDescription: High-intensity focused electromagnetic therapy to strengthen the entire pelvic floor.
btl-emsella-chair.description: Remain fully clothed while 11,200 supramaximal contractions activate deep pelvic floor muscles, rebuilding continence and sexual function after childbirth or menopause.
btl-emsella-chair.results: Improvement after first session, best after 6

lichen-sclerosis-female.title: Lichen Sclerosus Relief Programme
lichen-sclerosis-female.shortDescription: Combined PRP, light therapy, and barrier repair to calm chronic vulvar inflammation.
lichen-sclerosis-female.description: We pair anti-inflammatory PRP injections with LED photobiomodulation and compounded topicals to reduce plaques, itching, and micro-tears for long-term comfort.

steps.title: Confidential Consultation
steps.description: 45-minute appointment focused on symptoms, sexual goals, and hormone or birth history.

steps.title: Custom Diagnostics
steps.description: Pelvic exam, ultrasound, or lab testing to understand tissue tone, hormone balance, and inflammation.

steps.title: Tailored Treatment Plan
steps.description: Combine PRP, energy devices, supplements, and pelvic coaching for multi-layered results.

steps.title: Concierge Follow-Up
steps.description: App-based check-ins, flare management, and reviews at 6 and 12 weeks.

faq.question: Will anyone know I'm visiting the clinic?
faq.answer: Appointments are staggered, check-in is discreet, and communications use neutral language. A female team member can greet you on arrival.

faq.question: Is the O-Shot painful?
faq.answer: Topical anaesthetic, vibration analgesia, and optional nerve blocks make the injections highly tolerable. Most patients report mild pressure for a few seconds.

faq.question: How many EMSELLA sessions do I need?
faq.answer: A standard protocol is six sessions over three weeks. We reassess at visit six and can add booster sessions every 6-9 months if needed.

faq.question: Can I combine Ultra Femme with PRP?
faq.answer: Yes. Many women begin with Ultra Femme 360 to tighten tissue and follow with an O-Shot to maximise blood flow and neurosensory improvement.

faq.question: Do you treat lichen sclerosus long term?
faq.answer: We design maintenance plans with quarterly PRP, barrier repair prescriptions, and dietary guidance to keep symptoms controlled.
